name: Our Solar System
description:
An educational game about space and our solar system.

Especially useful if you have kids (who dislike reading plain text), since it also contains videos for each planet (although these are in Greek only, they are still quite cool).

The information for each planet is taken from Wikipedia using their web service.

Made for a school assignment, the goal was to use any sort of web service and create an application that would fit in the context of e-gov, e-health, e-commerce or e-learning.
